title: Sting of Pleasure
description: A luscious young beauty, Lucinda Valentine, is on the verge of taking center stage in a spectacular show filled with beautiful showgirls in lavish costumes… a classic Las Vegas production. However, twisting turns of fate lead her down dark paths into curious world of S&M.Becoming involved with a small dance troupe that tours around the world, she and her newfound lover, Claire, meet up with the wealthy and deviant Stephen Foxworthy. Stephen arranges for the women to become the ‘main event’ at the most interesting types of sexual encounters one can only imagine.Not for the faint-hearted. Will lovely Lucinda become the latest victim of Stephen’s abnormal desires? Allow him to control her life? Or can she escape to find peace and serenity in the love of one man? But perhaps this is that truly what she wants and needs. What will be Lucinda’s final outcome?
author: Mallory West
